headline: HCA Healthcare Named One of the World’s Most Admired Companies by Fortune
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., April 07, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that it has been named on Fortune’s 2025 World’s Most Admired Companies list. HCA Healthcare is ranked first overall in its industry.

headline: 2 Stocks to Buy if You're Worried About a Recession
summary: If a recession does hit, it might also affect the stock market, and different companies and sectors will perform differently.  Let's consider two stocks that should handle recessions better than most and are worth investing in for the long haul: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: VRTX) and HCA Healthcare (NYSE: HCA).  Vertex Pharmaceuticals is best known for developing cystic fibrosis (CF) drugs.
